context:
* New students need to pay by the offer expiry date mentioned in their letter of acceptance.
* Payments can be made through Electronic Bank Transfers (EBTs) or Credit Cards.
* EBTs can be facilitated through the Canadian Imperial Bank of Commerce (CIBC) International Student Pay portal, allowing for a preferred exchange rate and payment in home currency.
* Students should log into their Online Application for International Students to initiate payment.
* To pay using China Union Pay credit card, Wechat eWallets, or Alipay, students need to go to the CIBC International Student Pay Portal after logging into the Online Application for International Students.
* The information contained in the website is subject to change without notice and should not be viewed as a representation, offer, or warranty.
* Contact details for inquiries: 416-415-2000 (local), 1-800-265-2002 (toll-free in Canada and USA), ask.george@georgebrown.ca, or visit the Social Media Hub.
* Winter 2024 programs delivery details can be learned through a dedicated webpage.
* Application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, and more can be kept up-to-date by signing up for notifications.
